p: A literature search was conducted on MEDLINE, PubMed, PubMed Central (PMC), Google Scholar, the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ), The Journal Author Name Estimator (JANE), University repositories, and from grey literature to identify relevant articles/theses/ reference material containing information on previously reported traditional uses, pharmacological/chemical activities, and toxicological data on the medicinal plants indicated for the management of respiratory illnesses in Kisumu East Sub County. Studies were excluded if they were not in English.
